title: Manage all  your IDs in one place with Iden-T-Fy!

description.__html:
Averi Studios is proud to announce our new project: Iden-T-Fy.
It's an app that replaces physical ID cards with a central, digital ID hub on your phone. Rather than taking a photo of your ID cards like most other identification apps, the Iden-T-Fy app provides a single authentication profile that organizations can use to verify your identity.

To learn more, send us an email at:
averistudios@gmail.com
